# AdServSolution

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="adservsolutions"
  data-client="adservsolutions.com"
  data-zid="1"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration semantics, please contact the ad network.

Supported parameters:

-   `data-client`: ad server client
-   `data-zid`: ad zone id
